name: Mykola (Demo)
description:
Mykola is a 3d narrative-driven deck-building adventure game. Traverse to the afterlife and play a mysterious card game with the sad dead cowboys to save your brother's soul.

The Haunted Past

Helena is a fortune teller now and a gang member in the past. She gave up on criminal life when her brother died many years ago.

Everything changes when her brother returns from the dead and announces he is in trouble. He gambled his soul in the afterlife card game. Now Helena is forced to travel to the world of the dead and play an ominous card game. And the stakes of this game are too high.

In this demo, you can play through the First Chapter of the game.
